components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Telefonica O2 UK

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 UK. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Telefonica O2 UK. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery delays to Telefonica O2 UK. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

The Telcel network in Mexico is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 January 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 11 January 2023 at 20:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Telcel Mexico handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body: The Verizon network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 11 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 12 January 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Verizon US handsets when sending via US shortcode, US longcode and US Toll-free numbers.

The Vodafone network in Egypt is conducting an emergency maintenance from 13 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 13 January 2023 at 20:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Vodafone Egypt handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 January 2023 at 19:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 00:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US and Canadian handsets via subset of Longcodes and Shortcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Malaysia SMS Carrier Maintenance - U Mobile

incident_updates.body: The U Mobile network in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 15 January 2023 at 10:00 PST until 15 January 2023 at 13:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U Mobile Malaysia handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Malaysia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 08:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 11:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Malaysia handsets via a subset of Shortcodes.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 15:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Switzerland is conducting a planned maintenance from 16 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from subset of Twilio Switzerland phone numbers.

The Legos Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 January 2023 at 15:30 PST until 18 January 2023 at 18:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Legos Telecom handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 January 2023 at 17:00 PST until 18 January 2023 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from US handsets to  subsets of US shortcodes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance activity over T-Mobile network from 18 January 2023 at 21:00 PST until 19 January 2023 at 04:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via a subset of Longcodes.

Our SMS Carrier in Germany is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 January 2023 at 13:00 PST until 19 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Germany Short Codes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 January 2023 at 14:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 21:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bouygues Telecom handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

scheduled_maintenances.name: UK SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance  O2 Telefonica

incident_updates.body: The O2 Telefonica network in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 09 January 2023 at 22:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from O2 Telefonica Phone numbers, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of Twilio UK Long codes.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The TELIA (NetCom) network in Norway is conducting an emergency maintenance from 11 January 2023 at 15:00 PST until 11 January 2023 at 19:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from TELIA (NetCom) Norway handsets.
Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

09 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 09 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
11 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 11 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
16 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 16 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
18 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 18 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
23 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 23 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
25 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 25 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
30 January 2023 at 12:00 PST until 30 January 2023 at 16:00 PST
